scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run copy:files
scripts.copy:files: mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html *.js images favicon.svg dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy:files:win: if not exist dist mkdir dist && copy *.html dist && copy *.js dist && if not exist dist\images mkdir dist\images && copy images\* dist\images && copy favicon.svg dist
